content: अमंद {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not slow or dull, active, intelligent; <ls>M. 2. 8.</ls> {@--2@} Sharp, strong, violent (wind &c.). {@--3@} Not little, much, excessive, great, violent; अमंदमददुर्दिन <ls>U. 5. 5</ls>; अमंदमिलदिंदिरे निखिलमाधुरीमंदिरे <ls>Bv. 4. 1</ls>; °दष्टौष्ठकरावधूननं <ls>Ki. 8. 6</ls> violently bit. --दः <ab>N.</ab> of a tree.
